title: Moero! Top Striker (Top Striker)
synopsis: Hikaru Kicker is a 13-year-old boy who loves football. He has grown up playing with a football at all times ever since his father's friend gave him one when he was still only a baby.
staff: [['Yasumura, Ryou', ['Director']], ['Yamada, Etsuji', ['Sound Director']], ['Ishidou, Hiroyuki', ['Episode Director']], ['Kuriyama, Yoshihide', ['Episode Director', ' Storyboard']]]
